body_html:
Thanks for the update, @lamberta

Agree with @drpngx, it would be great to share the exact script which is used to produce the pre-built binary.

E.g. from https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/blob/master/site/en/install/source.md, I still have no idea what CUDA compute capability is used for pre-built binary.

body:
Thanks for the update, @lamberta 

Agree with @drpngx, it would be great to share the exact script which is used to produce the pre-built binary.

E.g. from https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/blob/master/site/en/install/source.md, I still have no idea what CUDA compute capability is used for pre-built binary.
